jobDescription: Avg $70k+,Excellent Home Time, Benefits after 30 days  Requisition ID: 850  Company Drivers can expect dedicated regional runs, with great home-time, fair pay, comprehensive benefits, steady work and a commitment from us to advance your career.We don't just make promises- you have an interview with the Ops Mgr, you know what the job is about, YOU make the decision to join Cardinal!For more information contact Dave at 833.243.6555Truck Driver Pay & Benefits  Full-time CDL truck drivers are eligible for:  Terminal is in Upper Marlboro, MD  Avg Annual Gross is $70k+  Regional w/ Excellent Home Time  (Boston, Charlotte, Cleveland)  Sleepers / Day Cabs  Paid Orientation/ Smith System and CSATraining (Upper Marlboro, MD)  Comprehensive Benefits Package after only 30 days  Driver Friendly Freight (stores have receiving teams)  Truck Driver Qualifications  Class A Commercial Driver's License (CDL-A)  9 Months T/T experience in the last 3 yrs, or 2 years of experience with in the past 5 years.  22+ yrs. of age  EEO/AAA/m/f/Vets/Disabled  Join Our Cardinal/Greatwide Team - Apply TODAY!
